import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; // Importation d'Axios import Headline from '../../layouts/form/headline'; import ProgressBar from './progressbare'; import Footerform from '../../layouts/form/footerform'; function FormulaireDesignCircularity() { const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0); const [errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState(''); const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState({ postalAddress: '', emailAddress: '', webAddress: '', partNumbers: '', manualRemovalBattery: false, manualDisassemblyBatteryPack: false, extinguishingAgent: '', safetyMeasures: '', preConsumerRecycledNickel: '', preConsumerRecycledCobalt: '', preConsumerRecycledLithium: '', preConsumerRecycledLead: '', postConsumerRecycledNickel: '', postConsumerRecycledCobalt: '', renewableContentShare: '', postConsumerRecycledLeadShare: '', postConsumerRecycledLithiumShare: '', wastePrevention: '', wasteBatteries: '', separateCollection: '' }); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = event.target; setFormValues((prevValues) => ({ ...prevValues, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Empêcher le comportement par défaut du formulaire const data = { DesignofCircularity: { postalAddress: formValues.postalAddress, emailAddress: formValues.emailAddress, webAddress: formValues.webAddress, partNumbers: formValues.partNumbers, manualRemovalBattery: formValues.manualRemovalBattery, manualDisassemblyBatteryPack: formValues.manualDisassemblyBatteryPack, }, batterySafetyRequirements: { extinguishingAgent: formValues.extinguishingAgent, safetyMeasures: formValues.safetyMeasures, }, recycledAndRenewableContent: { preConsumerRecycledNickel: formValues.preConsumerRecycledNickel, preConsumerRecycledCobalt: formValues.preConsumerRecycledCobalt, preConsumerRecycledLithium: formValues.preConsumerRecycledLithium, preConsumerRecycledLead: formValues.preConsumerRecycledLead, postConsumerRecycledNickel: formValues.postConsumerRecycledNickel, postConsumerRecycledCobalt: formValues.postConsumerRecycledCobalt, renewableContentShare: formValues.renewableContentShare, postConsumerRecycledLeadShare: formValues.postConsumerRecycledLeadShare, postConsumerRecycledLithiumShare: formValues.postConsumerRecycledLithiumShare, }, endOfLifeInformation: { wastePrevention: formValues.wastePrevention, wasteBatteries: formValues.wasteBatteries, separateCollection: formValues.separateCollection, } }; try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5555/api/design-circularity', data, { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }); return true; // Indiquer que la soumission a réussi } catch (err) { console.error('Erreur lors de la soumission du formulaire:', err); setErrorMessage('Erreur lors de la soumission du formulaire. Veuillez réessayer.'); return false; // Indiquer que la soumission a échoué } }; const handleNext = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Empêcher le comportement par défaut du bouton si utilisé directement setProgress(100); // Mettre à jour la progression const submissionSuccessful = await handleSubmit(); // Soumettre le formulaire et obtenir le résultat if (submissionSuccessful) { navigate('/batterymaterials'); // Redirection vers la page suivante en cas de succès } }; const handlePrevious = () => { navigate('/supplychain'); }; return (

); } export default FormulaireDesignCircularity;
